sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-dialog v-model="dialog">
    <template v-slot:activator="{ on }">
      <v-btn color="primary" dark v-on="on" v-if="custom == true">
        Create Custom Investment
    </v-btn>
    <v-btn color="primary" dark v-on="on" v-else>
      <v-icon dark>
        mdi-magnify
      </v-icon>
      </v-btn>
  </template>
  <v-form @submit.prevent="onSubmit">
    <v-container>
      <v-row>
        <v-col>
          <v-card class="pa-4">
            <v-row>
              <v-col v-if="template==true">
                <v-autocomplete
                  v-model="inv.name"
                  :items="investmentNames"
                  :return-object="true"
                  item-text="name"
                  dense
                  label="Investment Name"/>
              </v-col>
              <v-col v-if="template==false">
                <v-text-field
                  :value="customOrFull()"
                  @input="inv.custom_name = $event"
                  dense
                  label="Investment Name"/>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
            <v-row>
              <v-col>
                <v-text-field
                  v-if="template==false"
                  label="Amount"
                  dense
                  type="number"
                  v-model="inv.amount" />
              </v-col>
              <v-col>
                <v-checkbox v-model="inv.cash" label="Cash Account"></v-checkbox>
              </v-col>
              <v-col>
                <v-checkbox v-model="inv.TD" label="Term Deposit"></v-checkbox>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
            <v-row>
              <v-col>
                <v-autocomplete
                    :value="inv.investment_class"
                    @input="(inv.investment_class = $event) && (inv.investment_class_id = $event)"
                    :items="investmentClassList"
                    item-text="name"
                    item-value="id"
                    dense
                    label="Select an investment class"/>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
              <v-row>
                <v-col>
                  <v-text-field
                  label="Investment fee"
                  dense
                  type="number"
                  v-model="inv.investment_fee" />
                </v-col>
                <v-col>
                  <v-text-field
                  label="Buy spread"
                  dense
                  type="number"
                  v-model="inv.buy_spread" />
                </v-col>
                <v-col>
                  <v-text-field
                  label="Sell spread"
                  dense
                  type="number"
                  v-model="inv.sell_spread" />
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
              <v-row v-if="template==true">
                <v-col>
                  <v-text-field
                  label="APIR Code"
                  dense
                  v-model="inv.APIR_code" />
                </v-col>
                <v-col>
                  <v-text-field
                  label="ASX Code"
                  dense
                  v-model="inv.ASX_code" />
                </v-col>
                <v-col>
                  <v-text-field
                  label="Other Code"
                  dense
                  v-model="inv.other_code" />
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
              <v-row v-if="template==true">
                <v-col>
                  <v-autocomplete
                    label="Platform Limitation"
                    dense
                    v-model="inv.platform_limitation"
                    :items="platforms"
                    item-text="name"
                    item-value="id"
                  />
                </v-col>
              </v-row>

            <v-btn type="submit" color="primary">Save</v-btn>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
        <v-col>
          <v-card class="pa-4">
            <v-card-title>Asset Allocation</v-card-title>
              <v-row
                v-for="aaName in nameSet"
                :key="Object.values(aaName)[0]"
                dense>
                <v-col>
                  <v-card-text>
                    {{Object.values(aaName)[0]}}
                  </v-card-text>
                </v-col>
                <v-col>
                  <v-text-field
                  dense outlined solo
                  :value = "getAAPercentage(aaName,inv)"
                  @input = "setAAPercentage($event, aaName, inv)" />
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
    </v-form>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
export default {
  name: "AddCustomInvestment",
  inject: {
    platformId: { default: null },
    scenarioId: { default: null },
  },
  props: {
    investment: {
      type: Object,
      required: false,
      default: function() {
        return {
          id: null,
          custom_name: null,
          investment_class: null,
          amount: null,
          investment_fee: null,
          buy_spread: null,
          sell_spread: null,
          cash: false,
          TD: false,
          aa: [],
        }
      },
    },
    custom: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false
    },
    template: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false
    },
    nameList: {
      type: Array,
      required: true
    },
    investmentClassList: {
      type: Array,
      required: true
    },
    investmentNames: {
      type: Array,
      required: false
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      error: null,
      dialog: false,
      platforms: null,
    };
  },
  computed: {
    inv: {
      get() {
        return this.investment
      },
      set(newInvestment) {
        return newInvestment
      }
    },
    nameSet: function (){
      let AANameList = [];
      let checkList = []
      for (let i = 0; i < this.nameList.length; i++) {
        let found = false;
        let aaName = this.nameList[i];
          if (checkList.includes(aaName.custom_name)) {
            found = true;
          }
          if (!found) {
            let newAA = {};
            newAA[aaName.id] = aaName.custom_name;
            newAA.name = aaName.name;
            AANameList.push(newAA);
            found = false;
            checkList.push(aaName.custom_name);
          }
      }
      return (AANameList)
    },

  },
  watch: {
    investment: function () {
      this.getAAData();
      if (this.template == true) {
        this.inv.template = true;
        this.getPlatformList();
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    setAAPercentage(event, aaName, inv) {
      const aaID = Number(Object.keys(aaName)[0]);
      let found = false;
      for (let i=0; i < this.inv.aa.length; i++){
        found = false;
        let rp = null;
        if (Object.keys(this.inv.aa[i].name).length === 0) {
          rp = this.inv.aa[i].rp_name_id;
          if (rp == aaID) {
            this.inv.aa[i].percentage = event/100;
            found = true;
            break;
          }
        } else {
          rp = this.inv.aa[i].name.rp_aaname_link;
          if (rp.includes(aaID)) {
            this.inv.aa[i].percentage = event/100;
            found = true;
            break;
          }
        }
      }
      if (!found) {
        let newAllocation = {}
        newAllocation.name = {}
        newAllocation.rp_name_id = aaID;
        newAllocation.percentage = event/100;
        newAllocation.investment = inv.id;
        newAllocation.id = null;
        this.inv.aa.push(newAllocation);
      }
    },
    getAAPercentage(aaName, inv) {
      let percentage = 0
      if (this.inv.aa) {
        for (let i=0; i < inv.aa.length; i++) {
          let rp = null;
          const aa = Number(Object.keys(aaName)[0]);
          if (Object.keys(this.inv.aa[i].name).length === 0) {
            rp = this.inv.aa[i].rp_name_id;
            if (rp == aa) {
              percentage += Number(inv.aa[i].percentage);
            }
          } else {
            rp = this.inv.aa[i].name.rp_aaname_link;
            if (rp.includes(aa)) {
              percentage += Number(inv.aa[i].percentage);
            }
          }
        }
      };
      return +(percentage*100).toFixed(2)
    },
    getAAData() {
      if (this.inv.id != null) {
        let endpoint = null;
        if (this.template == false) {
          endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/investments/${this.inv.id}/aa/`;
        } else {
          endpoint = `/api/investmenttemplate/${this.inv.id}/aa/`;
        }
        apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
            this.inv.aa = data.results;
        });
      }
    },
    onSubmit() {
      if (this.custom == true) {
        let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/investments/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "POST", {
          name_id: null,
          custom_name: this.inv.custom_name,
          investment_class_id: this.inv.investment_class.id,
          platform: this.platformId,
          amount: this.inv.amount,
          edited: true,
          investment_fee: this.inv.investment_fee,
          buy_spread: this.inv.buy_spread,
          sell_spread: this.inv.sell_spread,
          cash: this.inv.cash,
          TD: this.inv.TD,
        }).then(data => {
          this.addAA(data.id);
        });
      } else if (this.custom == false && this.template == false) {
        let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/investments/${this.inv.id}/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", this.inv).then(data => {
          this.addAA(data.id);
        });
      } else if (this.template == true) {
        let endpoint = `/api/investmenttemplate/${this.inv.id}/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", this.inv).then(data => {
          this.addAA(data.id);
        });
      }
    },
    addAA(id) {
      if (this.inv.aa) {
        if (this.custom == true) {
          for (let i=0; i < this.inv.aa.length; i++) {
            let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/investments/${id}/aa/`;
            apiService(endpoint, "POST", {
              name_id: null,
              rp_name_id: this.inv.aa[i].rp_name_id,
              percentage: this.inv.aa[i].percentage,
              investment: id
            }).then(
              this.getAAData()
            );
          };
          this.dialog = false;
          this.$emit("add-investment",this.inv);
        } else {
          for (let i=0; i < this.inv.aa.length; i++) {
            if (this.newAA(this.inv.aa[i])) {
              let endpoint = ""
              if (this.template==false) {
                endpoint =`/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/investments/${this.inv.id}/aa/${this.inv.aa[i].id}/`;
              } else {
                endpoint =`/api/investmenttemplate/${this.inv.id}/aa/${this.inv.aa[i].id}/`;
              }
              apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", {
                name_id: this.inv.aa[i].name.id,
                rp_name_id: this.inv.aa[i].rp_name_id,
                percentage: this.inv.aa[i].percentage,
              }).then(
                this.getAAData()
              )
            } else {
              let endpoint = ""
              if (this.template==false) {
                endpoint =`/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/investments/${this.inv.id}/aa/${this.inv.aa[i].id}/`;
              } else {
                endpoint =`/api/investmenttemplate/${this.inv.id}/aa/`;
              }
              apiService(endpoint, "POST", {
                name_id: null,
                rp_name_id: this.inv.aa[i].rp_name_id,
                percentage: this.inv.aa[i].percentage,
                investment: id
              }).then(
                this.getAAData()
              );
            }
          };
          this.dialog = false;
          this.$emit("add-investment",this.inv);
        }
      }
    },
    newAA(aa) {
      if (aa.name.rp_aaname_link) {
        return true;
      } else {
        return false;
      }
    },
    getPlatformList() {
      if (this.template == true) {
        let endpoint = `/api/platformnames/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "GET").then(data => {
          this.platforms = data.results;
        });
      }
    },
    customOrFull() {
      if (this.inv.custom_name != "") {
        return this.inv.custom_name
      } else {
        return this.inv.name.name
      }
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getAAData();
    this.getPlatformList();
  }
};
</script>
